name: UV Bacon
description:
You're "Redneck"; the prodigal disciple of a brilliant, southern bacon-farmer.

"The Farmer" decided to cut out the middle man and make his bacon in-house. He launches the pigs into the sky and to let them be fried by the sun. His disciple (you) are tasked to run around the farm with a bucket collecting the fallout.

Collect Bacon, Not Bones.

Play with the mouse.
